371 out of 719 (51%) of fire evacuations ordered since 2012 have occurred in seven Northern Manhattan neighborhoods, including 54 vacate orders in Hamilton Heights.

Active Vacate Orders in Community District 9

There are 31 active Vacate Orders due to fire damage, including three entire building evacuations, affecting 118 housing units.
